thread.title: Simplify your life the Late Show way
thread.title_full: Simplify your life the Late Show way - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Simplify your life the Late Show way
text: Stephen explains how to work smarter and harder...or 'smarder'. See what he did there? He combined two words to make saying 'smarter and harder' a LOT more simpler. Stephen is also a regular subscriber of the 'Internet' and has found a few new ways to help you do ordinary tasks a better way - or as he calls them 'Life Hacked'. Watch the video for more!
